title: 60: Chit Chatty: Bach Talk and Q&A
itunes:title: 60: Chit Chatty: Bach Talk and Q&A
description:
The Broads have to discuss this weeks #bachnation drama aka the Twitter War of 2019, Sweetie Pete’s Ex, and some Jed tea! They also answer some of your questions about death, downstair’s hair, and more! 
Chatty Broads is recorded and produced @theblueroommedia www.theblueroommedia.com (http://www.theblueroommedia.com/)
***AMOUR VERT: Go to http://shopgreenlove.com/CHATTY for 15% off your first order!
***CARE/OF: For 25% off your first Care/of order, go to TakeCareOf.com and enter code CHATTY!
*** THIRD LOVE:  Go to Thirdlove.com/CHATTY now to find your perfect-fitting bra and get 15% off your first purchase!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
